en: An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
cn: 每天吃苹果，不用看医生。

en: Where there is a will, there is a way.
Every coin has two sides.
All roads lead to Roman.
Great minds think alike.
Kill two birds with one stone.
One is never too old to learn.
Habit is a second nature.
Don't judge a book by its cover.
East or west, home is the best.
cn: 金窝银窝，不如自己的草窝。

en: A friend in need is a friend indeed.
If you venture nothing, you will have nothing.
Bad news travels fast.
cn: 好事不出门，坏事传千里。

en: A good beginning is half the success.
cn: 好的开始是成功的一半。

en: It is never too late to mend.
Mind acts upon mind.
Love me, love my dog.
Two heads are better than one.
cn: 三个臭皮匠，顶个诸葛亮。

en: No pains, no gains.
Tomorrow is another day.
A word spoken is past recalling.
More haste, less speed.
Better late than never.
Every man has his day.
He who laughs last, laughs best.
cn: 谁笑到最后，谁笑得最好。

en: Keep your mouth shut and your ears open
Think twice before your action.
Actions speak louder than words.
Never do things by halves.
No man is wise at all times.
One today is worth two tomorrows.
cn: 一个今天胜似两个明天。

en: Save for a rainy day.
The early bird catches the worm.
There are no waves without wind.
Time is money.
Where there is life, there is hope.
cn: 留得青山在，不怕没柴烧。

en: Business is business.
Many hands make quick work.
A cat in gloves catches no mice.
